To make sure spell checking works in the packed application we must add 'PySpellchecker' dictionaries in the correct directory. Create the following folder structure and put the dictionaries inside `spellchecker/resources/`.
Dictionaries can be found in the library installation directory (if installed in a virtual environment `venv/Lib/site-packages/spellchecker/resources/`).
Make sure to include this folder structure in the `Proteus.spec` file like profiles and resources adding the following line `Tree('spellchecker', prefix='spellchecker')`.
